official_title: Joint resolution designating the period beginning January 28, 1975, and ending February 3, 1975, as Chattanooga Area Manufacturers Week.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to designate the period beginning January 28, 1975, and ending February 3, 1975, as "Chattanooga Area Manufacturers Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution designating the period beginning January 28, 1975, and ending February 3, 1975, as Chattanooga Area Manufacturers Week.
